channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-44852] Need exclude `junit-jupiter-api` from `curator-test`
item.description:
SPARK-44792 Upgrade curator to 5.2.0,  `curator-test` depends on `junit-jupiter-api`, but Apache Spark currently does not support testing with JUnit5, so it will report the following error when executing `

build/mvn clean install -pl core -am -Dtest.exclude.tags=org.apache.spark.tags.ExtendedLevelDBTest`.

 

[INFO] -------------------------------------------------------
[INFO]  T E S T S
[INFO] -------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] TestEngine with ID 'junit-vintage' failed to discover tests
[INFO] 
[INFO] Results:
[INFO]

[INFO] Spark Project Shuffle Streaming Service ............ SUCCESS [ 14.355 s]
[INFO] Spark Project Unsafe ............................... SUCCESS [ 12.321 s]

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Issue resolved by pull request 42539
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/42539
